TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {6682=The median sales price for homes in ZIP code 97219 in Portland from Apr 15 to Jul 15 was $396,500 based on 231 sales. Compared to the same period one year ago, the median sales price increased 9.8%, or $35,355, and the number of sales increased 3.6%. Average price per square foot for homes in 97219 was $227, an increase of 10.2% compared to the same period last year. There are currently 176 resale and new homes in ZIP code 97219 on Trulia, including 10 open houses, as well as 37 homes in the pre-foreclosure, auction, or bank-owned stages of the foreclosure process. The average listing price for homes for sale in 97219 was $630,147 for the week ending Jul 22, which represents an increase of 2.7%, or $16,729, compared to the prior week. Popular ZIP codes in Portland include 97229 and 97219, with average listing prices of $589,908 and $630,147.}
